sentences.sentence: "Mr Mandela is still overwhelmed by requests to write book forewords," his foundation said.
sentences.translation: 曼德拉基金会表示：“要曼德拉先生为书作序的请求多得让他喘不过气来。”

sentences.sentence: It was argued that the keys to write a sports news with new ideas are new fact, new angel, new title, new forewords etc.
sentences.translation: 本文认为，体育新闻要写出新意，关键要做到“四新”，即事实要新、角度要新、标题要新、导语要新。

sentences.sentence: Forewords: Here is the English words named "Words to Life", I searched in Web, but I relay do not know who was the writer.
sentences.translation: 我在网上找到了“生活箴言”，但我确实不知道她是谁写的。
